Articles.Content: Yeah, there is a LOT of science to do in KSP, but I'm more than tired of sticking the same 6 science experiments on my craft, and, other than DMagic, there is almost no other mods with science equipment in them. I would like someone to make a mod which is just full of some, hopefully, nice looking science parts.

You can try the progressive science parts from my stanford torus mod (shameless plug)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84106-0-25-Stanford-Torus-0-5

Man there's a few science mods available!

You have Dmagic.

There's:

Station science adds I think another 10 or so experiments.

Tarsier Space Technology adds a few

Rovers pack (don't know if updated)

L-Tech Scientific Industries (don't know if updated)

Orbital Material Science adds a few cool experiments and works off of Station Science (when it gets updated)

Interstellar offers a cool telescope

The most important thing to add though is Crowd Source Science Logs. It changes a most of the science definitions that are used.

I love Dmagic and Station Science and when it gets updated I'll definitely add Orbital Material Science
